items.sentence: I don't think that Tom would mind if I used his bicycle.
I don't think that Tom would ever let me read his diary.
I don't think anybody really thought that Tom was happy.
I don't think Tom had anything to do with what happened.

I don't think that I've ever seen Tom this angry before.
You're wrong. Tom plays the clarinet, not the saxophone.

Someone hacked into my account and changed the password.
You should've told Tom why it was a bad idea to do that.
The last thing I remember was hearing a sound behind me.

I can't understand why Tom would do something like that.
